file.name: UserRegistrationAPI-openapi-1.0.0.yml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: User registration API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: APi used for registering new users in the system
paths:
  /register:
    post:
      requestBody:
        description: A User registration request
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserRegistration'
            examples:
              chuck:
                value:
                  fullName: Chuck Norris
                  email: chuck@norris.com
                  age: 23
        required: true
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApprovedUserRegistration'
              examples:
                chuck:
                  value:
                    id: '{{ randomString(32) }}'
                    fullName: '{{ request.body/fullName }}'
                    email: '{{ request.body/email }}'
                    age: 23
                    registrationDate: '{{ now() }}'
          description: An approved User registration completed with id and date
      operationId: CreateUserRegistration
      summary: Create a new registration
components:
  schemas:
    UserRegistration:
      title: Root Type for UserRegistration
      description: ""
      type: object
      properties:
        fullName:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        age:
          type: integer
      example:
        fullName: Firstname Lastname
        email: john@example.com
        age: 42
    ApprovedUserRegistration:
      title: Root Type for UserRegistration
      description: ""
      required:
      - id
      - registrationDate
      type: object
      properties:
        fullName:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        age:
          type: integer
        id:
          type: string
        registrationDate:
          type: string
      example:
        id: Wen7JHPUzriJxbmw9btmFhZypjPYUM8B
        fullName: Firstname Lastname
        email: john@example.com
        age: 42
        regsitrationDate: "1600244138045"
